192.168.1.64/26

subnet with at most 8 devices per subnet

network		subnet		host
1- 192.168.1.01	00		0000
network ip 192.168.1.64/28
last ip 192.168.1.78/28

2- 192.168.1.01	01		0000
network ip 192.168.1.80/28

3- 192.168.1.01	10		0000
network ip 192.168.1.96/28

4- 192.168.1.01	11		0000
network ip 192.168.1.112/28

192.168.1.01	11		00 00
1st  ip: 192.168.1.113/30
last ip: 192.168.1.114/30

192.168.1.01	11		01 00
1st  ip: 192.168.1.117/30
last ip: 192.168.1.118/30
